title: Looking for an AD carry
body:
Hi guys
I have not been having much luck in ranked after my promos so i'm looking for a ADC who can help dominate the bot lane. 
Contact me on this thread if you are interested. 
Thanks

replies.body: I main ADC, looking for support I added you if you like we can play together.

I am an ADC if you want to team up that will be great 
IGN Kaneki Kazuto

added
up for a game now?
